com.garmin.health.sync

Interface AbstractSyncListener

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    LoggingSyncListener

    public interface AbstractSyncListener

    • Method Detail

      • onSyncStarted

        void onSyncStarted(Device device)
        Called when a sync has started.
        Parameters:
        device - the Device that is syncing

      • onSyncComplete

        void onSyncComplete(Device device)
        Called when a sync successfully finishes reading all available files and writing any settings or firmware that were provided.
        Parameters:
        device - the Device that is syncing

      • onSyncFailed

        void onSyncFailed(Device device,
                  Exception e)
        Called when a sync fails.
        Parameters:
        device - the Device that is syncing
        e - the cause of the failure

      • onSyncProgress

        default void onSyncProgress(Device device,
                            int progress)
        Called when sync progress has updated. Sync progress reaches 100% when all files are uploaded and downloaded from device. At this point other device operations are possible (including additional syncs) despite this, the this#onSyncComplete(Device) callback will not occur until all files are processed and all data is persisted. Depending on the circumstance this could take some time, so continue to wait for completion callback before processing sync data.
        Parameters:
        device - the Device that is syncing
        progress - the integer progress as a percent of the sync currently happening

      • onSyncAuditComplete

        default void onSyncAuditComplete(Device device,
                                 boolean syncCompletelySuccessful,
                                 Callable<File> file)
        Called when a sync audit has been completed.
        Parameters:
        device - the Device that is syncing
        syncCompletelySuccessful - true if absolutely no errors occurred in sync processing, otherwise false
        file - a consumer for the file

      • onServiceDisconnected

        default void onServiceDisconnected()
        Called when the Garmin Health service has been severed. Further communication should not be attempted until the service has restarted and been rebound. This method will not be called unless the Health SDK is implemented using the service communication. To determine the cause of service failure please review the logs for the process running the Garmin Health service.
